sqlMap.statement: SELECT * FROM SHPG_ORD A ,SO_TO_VND_NTFY_MSTR B WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM SO_TO_VND_NTFY_CTRL C WHERE C.SO_NUM=A.SO_NUM AND C.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND C.EZCANCELFLAG = '0') AND A.WH_CD=B.WH_CD AND A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND A.SO_CRAT_TS >= #dsBizLastProcTs# AND A.SO_CRAT_TS < #nowTime# AND B.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND B.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY A.WH_CD ,A.SO_CRAT_TS
